org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact

Class ClassPropertyFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.ClassPropertyFetcher

  • public class ClassPropertyFetcher
extends Object
    Accesses class "properties": static fields, static getters, instance fields or instance getters

    Method and Field instances are cached for fast access

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Lari Hotari, Sagire Software Oy (Grails), Andres Almiray
